text: Dzieciuki () — Belarusian folk punk group from Hrodna. It was founded on April 10, 2012. The group has released two studio albums, Haradzenski harmidarКАРОТКІ КУРС ГІСТОРЫІ БЕЛАРУСІ АД ГАРАДЗЕНСКІХ ПАНКАЎ / Tuzin.fm and Recha.Dzieciuki выдалі канцэптуальны альбом "Рэха" (+слухаць/+спампаваць) / Experty.by It positions itself as an educational folk punk brigade, which tells about unrevealed pages of Belarusian history. Several of the Dzieciuki members also take part in Liudzi na baloce group.DZIECIUKI: «КРЫТЫКІ ПРОЙДУЦЦА ПА НАШЫМ АЛЬБОМЕ НАЖДАКОМ» / Tuzin.fm In 2014 the musicians won the "Heroes of the year" award of Belarusian music portal Tuzin.fm."Героі 2014": Leibonik і Dzieciuki (+слухаць) / Experty.by From the very beginning of their concert activity, many of their performances in Belarus were prohibited by the authorities.DZIECIUKI ПАПОЎНІЛІ «ЧОРНЫ СЬПІС» (+КАМЭНТАР ГУРТУ) / Tuzin.fm Thus, their concerts in BrestКАНЦЭРТ ГУРТА DZIECIUKI ЗАБАРОНЕНЫ БЕРАСЬЦЕЙСКІМ КДБ (ВІДЭА І КАМЭНТАР ГУРТА) / Tuzin.fm and MinskІДЭОЛЯГІ ПРАЦЯГВАЮЦЬ ВАЙНУ СУПРАЦЬ «ДЗЕЦЮКОЎ», А BRUTTO ПАДТРЫМАЛІ ДЗЯРЖАЎНЫЯ ПРАФСАЮЗЫ / Tuzin.fm were prohibited. On April 1, 2017 the concert surprisingly was allowed and took place in Vicebsk.«Дзецюкі» нарэшце выступяць у Беларусі / NovyChas.by == Discography == === Albums === * Haradzenski harmidar () (EP, 2012) * Haradzenski harmidar () (2014) * Recha () (2016) === Collections === * Re:Pesniary () (2014), "A chto tam idze" track () * Tribute To The Pogues (2016), "Ne saskoču!" track () == Videos == * Sumnaje regi (, 2014-2015) * Laddzia rospačy (, 2015-2016) * Liasnyja braty (, 2017)ПАША ТРАБЛ: «ВЕЛЬМІ ДРЭННА, КАЛІ З ГІСТОРЫІ НЯ РОБЯЦЬ ВЫСНОВАЎ» (ВІДЭА) / Tuzin.fm == Group members == * Dzianis Žyhavec: lyrics * Paša 'Trouble' Trublin: vocals, Belarusian duda * Aleś Dzianisaŭ: acoustic guitar, banjo, vocals * Andrej 'Piton' Piatko: bass guitar, vocals * Mikola 'Kaliamba' Paliakou: accordion * Lioša Pudzin: guitar * Andrej Pudzin: guitar * Sania 'Syr' Syraježka: drum kit ==References== ==External links== * Dzieciuki on Last.fm * Dzieciuki on YouTube * Dzieciuki on Facebook Category:Folk punk groups Category:Musical groups established in 2012 Category:2012 establishments in Belarus Category:Belarusian musical groups
title: Dzieciuki
